mapper.select: SELECT PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT SEQ, COURSE_ID, TITLE, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, IF(DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%y.%m.%d'),'Y','N') IS_NEW, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 ROWNUM FROM BOARD_NOTICE, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) NUM WHERE COURSE_ID = #{courseId} AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%') ORDER BY SEQ ) DATA ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) PAGE LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM BOARD_NOTICE WHERE COURSE_ID = #{courseId} AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{findString},'%')
SELECT SEQ, COURSE_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD_NOTICE WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
UPDATE BOARD_NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT SEQ, COURSE_ID, TITLE, VIEW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE, IF(DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%y.%m.%d'),'Y','N') IS_NEW FROM BOARD_NOTICE WHERE COURSE_ID = #{courseId} ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT ${limit}
